short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transposes All Chords on ultimate-guitar to Solfege.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to use Ultimate-guitar.com and find that all the chords are not written the way you learnt them?

For example you know the chords in Solfege as "Do Re Mi" and find it hard transposing from "C B D"

Then this extension is for you!

It reads the chords on Ultimate-Guitar.com, Transposes them to the equivalent solfege notation, then writes it to the page seamlessly. It handles all chords that are correctly identified on the site, and even transposes both sides of the Slash Chords separately.
